invocations.description: Verifies that certain requirements, such as libraries and bot version, are met. Throws an error if it doesn't.
invocations.ex:
init start
	requires({{$botversion, "3.0.0", "Bot version"}})
init end

auto(200, 400)
...
invocations.exDescription: It'll throw an error if the current version of your bot is lower than 3.0.0
